profile:
Stannah is recognized around the world as the company that brings freedom, independence and a strong sense of safety back to anyone who has difficulty overcoming the challenges posed by the stairs in their home. Indoors and outdoors, around the world there are more Stannah stairlifts in place than any other brand.

Ever since Stannah was established as a family-owned company almost 150 years ago, we have been committed to quality craftsmanship. Safety, reliability, and value are the tools of our trade, while you, our customer, are our primary focus. We want you to understand and enjoy freedom, independence and the inescapable feeling of pride that comes from being the master of your home.

services: Sales, Service, Installation of Stannah Stairlifts

profile:
Home Additions, General Contractors, Barrier Free Construction: elevators, lift, ramps (Universal Design), basement renovation, kitchen and bathroom renovation - (we are accessible 24 hours for your ultimate construction experience)

At The Construction Group, our goal is to deliver the best craftsmanship possible and to provide unparalleled service and care, ensuring that your renovation experience is positive and stress free. With over 30 years in the construction industry, we have the experience and expertise to handle any addition and renovation, (from refinishing your basement, bathroom or kitchen to a 2nd, 3rd storey or main floor addition). In partnership with some of the best design firms in the region, we help our clients achieve their dream homes. And with our 24/7 customer service line, our clients always have a peace of mind, knowing that we can be reached at a momentâ€™s notice. 

     Through our other branch, Barrier Free Construction, we add value to your house and help clients with temporary or long-term disabilities, from arthritis to a bad back, enjoy life in their home. We provide solutions to meet your changing needs. Our renovations balance comfort and accessibility with style and aesthetics to maintain a welcoming environment in your home. With our assistance, you can safely remain in your home for a lifetime.
     With more than 200 accessible renovations completed, we have the expertise to ensure that your home improvement project is smooth and efficient. Whether it is a small modification or a full addition, we provide you with the best solutions for your mobility issues. If you want to have your doctor or occupational therapist included in the consultation process, we are happy to oblige.
     A barrier free home does not have to look or feel institutional. Accessible features can be subtle and stylish. Roll-in showers can have the look of a stone or marble spa, grab bars come in a variety of finishes and colours, adjustable counters look no different from their standard counterparts and a widened doorway is unnoticeable.
service_area: Greater Toronto Area, Mississauga, Oakville, Pickering, Woodbridge

specialities: Home Additions (main, 2nd and 3rd floor), Barrier Free Construction (handicap access and Universal Design), General Contracting (kitchens, bathrooms, basements)
